snippet.title: Northernlion Plays - FANTASTIC CONTRAPTION on the HTC Vive!
snippet.description:
Check out the website! http://fantasticcontraption.com/

Last month I was invited to check out Fantastic Contraption, an in-development game for the HTC Vive VR platform. It blew me away (and I'm not being paid to say that!). Watch me walk around like a dork and build suboptimal machines in this video!
